title: The Hateful Eight Leaked Script - Quentin Tarantino.pdf
description:
Quentin Tarantino had planned to shoot his next movie, a tense, contained and very bloody Western centered on bounty hunters and titled Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Hateful Eight,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ using 70-millimeter stock, a rare and expensive high-definition film.

The movie opens on a sprawling Wyoming vista, and Tarantino sets the scene: Ã¢â‚¬Å“A breathtaking 70MM filmed (as is the whole movie) snow covered mountain range.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ But the story quickly shifts indoors, and stays there Ã¢â‚¬â€ in fact, the script reads more like a tense stage play than a sweeping Western film.

Tarantino has angrily scrapped plans to make the movie because the script leaked, and Hollywood assistants are now promulgating a link anyone can use to download a PDF of the script that will no doubt end up online in the coming days.
